entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Buchans
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:21 AM NST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 02 January 2023
